required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Quality Improvement Project for Reproductive Health Services in India, Phase 1
clinical_study.official_title: Strengthening People-centered Accessibility, Respect, and Quality for Reproductive Health Services in Uttar Pradesh, India, Phase 1

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of a quality improvement (QI) collaborative aimed at improving person-centered care (PCC) for reproductive health (RH) services.

detailed_description.textblock: Evaluation of a quality improvement (QI) collaborative in public facilities in Uttar Pradesh, India aimed at improving person-centered care (PCC) for reproductive health (RH) services.

primary_outcome.measure: Person Centered Maternal Health Scale Score
primary_outcome.description: Survey conducted with women: self report of experiences of care. Possible range 0-100; higher the score the better the experience of care

arm_group.description: Women who receive MH services from a facility participating in the QI collaborative to improve PCC
Women who receive MH services from a facility not participating in the QI collaborative to improve PCC
Provider working at a facility participating in the QI collaborative to improve PCC
Provider working at a facility not participating in the QI collaborative to improve PCC

intervention.description: Facilities that participated in a QI collaborative to improve PCC for MH services

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria for Women:
- Women aged 18-49
- Agree/consent to participate
- Delivered a baby at the facility within 7 days (or adopted a family planning method at time of visit (baseline only, not part of intervention))
Exclusion Criteria for Women:
- Not a women aged 18-49
- Did not agree/consent to participate
- Did not deliver a baby at the facility within 7 days (or adopted a family planning method at time of visit (baseline only, not part of intervention))
Inclusion Criteria for Providers:
- Agreed/consented to participate
- Staff at facility
Exclusion Criteria for Provider:
- Did not agree/consent to participate
- Not Staff at facility
